text: It shall be the duty of the Capitol Police hereafter to prevent any portion of the Capitol Grounds and terraces from being used as playgrounds or otherwise, so far as may be necessary to protect the public property, turf and grass from destruction.

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)

part.text: Authority to Make Regulations; Duty of Capitol Police.
